com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api

Class PcTouchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api.PcTouchHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class PcTouchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The PC game touch event handler class. Before creating PcTouchHandler you need to init TcrSession. All touch events on the user screen are obtained through `OnTouchListener#onTouch(View, MotionEvent)`. When the user triggers `MotionEvent#ACTION_MOVE`, the SDK will send a cursor movement event to the cloud and will recognize the click, long press, and double-click events in subsequent operations. PcTouchHandler.OnClickListener PcTouchHandler.OnLongClickListener PcTouchHandler.OnDoubleClickListener In addition, `enableScaling(float, float)` can be used to enable the zoom feature. The user can perform two-finger pinch to zoom the view passed in by `OnTouchListener#onTouch(View, MotionEvent)`.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PcTouchHandler.OnClickListener
      The click listener, which is used to listen for click events triggered in `PcTouchHandler`.
      static interface  PcTouchHandler.OnDoubleClickListener
      The double-click listener, which is used to listen for double-click events triggered in `PcTouchHandler`.
      static interface  PcTouchHandler.OnLongClickListener
      The long press listener, which is used to listen for long press events triggered in `PcTouchHandler`.

    • Method Detail

      • enableTouch

        public void enableTouch(boolean value)
        Enable/Disable touch.
        Parameters:
        value - `true` indicates to enable touch, and other values indicate to disable touch.

      • enableScaling

        public void enableScaling(float min,
                          float max)
        Enable two-finger pinch zoom on the game video image.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum zoom ratio, which must be greater than 0.
        max - The maximum zoom ratio, which must be greater than 1.

      • disableScaling

        public void disableScaling()
        Disable two-finger pinch zoom on the game video image.

      • onTouch

                       MotionEvent event)

      • resetTouch

        public void resetTouch()
        Reset all touch statuses.

      • setMouseConfig

        public void setMouseConfig(MouseConfig cfg)
        Set the mouse parameters.

        The gesture action triggered through MouseInternal#processTouchEvent(MotionEvent) determines how the cursor will move based on MouseConfig.isRelativeMove(). The cursor will move at the speed specified by MouseConfig.getMoveSensitivity().

        Parameters:
        cfg - The new mouseConfig, which will overwrite the original value.

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,

      • setOnClickListener

        public void setOnClickListener(PcTouchHandler.OnClickListener listener)
